name: Game Jam 2021
description:
Lost and found was created by 3 first year game development students at Falmouth University during the lost and found game jam. We had 48 hours between the 3 of us to make a game and we came up with a demo of a 2D game where you play as a grim reaper finding lost souls and avoiding demons as they try and stop your progress.

Thank you too:

Benedykt Cieśliński for the programming

David Milller for art assets and level design

Lucy Rodham for art assets
